data.text:
Azelis Belgium is the result of a melting pot of the former distributing companies Sepulchre NV and Sibeco NV (acquired in 2004), and YDS Chemicals NV (acquired in 2010).

Located in Merelbeke (Gent) we cater to a wide range of market segments for both Life Sciences and Industrial Chemicals. Specifically for Food & Health, we have a dedicated knowledge center or kitchen lab located in Rillaar. In Belgium, we are a reputed distributor, well known for our best-in-class network of third-party service providers, aimed at adding value and securing the highest level of flexibility to our broad customer and supplier base.
